definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: We can also Coated with emulsion for customer and make hole according to customer requirement.
sentences.chinese: 可以代客預上感光塗層，按照使用尺寸打定位孔。

sentences.english: Photographic paper is highly sensitive to light.
sentences.chinese: 感光紙對光線非常敏感。

sentences.english: Phenethylamine is also a skin irritant and possible sensitizer.
sentences.chinese: 苯乙胺也是皮膚刺激劑與可能的感光劑。

sentences.english: Light-sensitive molecules in the atmosphere scrub air pollution from the skies at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，感光的水分子減少了大氣中的污染物。

sentences.english: But was an extra photopigment all that was needed to evolve trichromatic vision?
sentences.chinese: 但是是否另一種感光色素必須完全進化成三色視覺？

sentences.english: It usually shows up more as speed and aperture increase.
sentences.chinese: 當感光度和孔徑增加的時候，這種現象往往會加重。

sentences.english: Any of various blue dyes, used to sensitize photographic emulsions to a greater range of light.
sentences.chinese: 菁，花青一種藍色染料，用來使攝影用的感光。

sentences.english: Both the eyes contain photo-sensitive cells which absorb the solar energy.
sentences.chinese: 它的雙眼都有可以吸收太陽能的感光電池。

sentences.english: In the mass spectrograph the ions are focused onto a photographic plate.
sentences.chinese: 在質譜儀中，離子聚焦在感光板上。

sentences.english: The use of distilled water is recommended, to reduce the possibility of unknown contaminants in the emulsion.
sentences.chinese: 建議是用蒸餾水，以避免未知物質對感光劑的污染。

sentences.english: A new method of silver nitrate preparation from waste photosensitive materials has studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了從廢感光材料中製備硝酸銀的工藝。

sentences.english: This study has explored the effect of resin composition on photosensitiveness and alkali solubility.
sentences.chinese: 研究了樹脂組成對感光性和鹼溶性的影響。

sentences.english: As the sensitive paper has been exposed to light, it is now useless.
sentences.chinese: 由於感光紙已經跑光，現在沒有什麼用處了。

sentences.english: These usually function in the eyes to sense light.
sentences.chinese: 這些視蛋白通常在眼睛裏有感光功能。

sentences.english: The color sensitive emulsion consists of three layers, each of which is sensitized for a different color.
sentences.chinese: 感色乳膠包括三層，每一層對一種不同的顏色感光。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
silver halide (usually chloride) used to fix photos
